summary: "The Crow" is a superhero movie that came out in 2024, directed by Rupert Sanders. It's a reboot of the "Crow" film series, based on a comic book from 1989. The story follows Eric, played by Bill Skarsg√•rd, who is brought back to life to seek revenge for him and his girlfriend's deaths. The film had a long and complicated journey to the big screen, with different directors and actors attached over the years. It finally arrived in theaters in August 2024, but unfortunately, it didn't do well with critics or at the box office.
title: The Crow (2024 film)
